metadata.title: CVE-2018-17358 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.31. An invalid memory access exists in _bfd_stab_section_find_nearest_line in syms.c. Attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted ELF file.

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.32-8ubuntu1').
